job_details.Functieomschrijving:
At Databricks, our core values are at the heart of everything we do; creating a culture of proactiveness and a customer-centric mindset guides us to create a unified platform that makes data science and analytics accessible to everyone. We aim to inspire our customers to make informed decisions that push their business forward. We provide a user-friendly and intuitive platform that makes it easy to turn insights into action and fosters a culture of creativity, experimentation, and continuous improvement. You will be an essential part of this mission, using your technical expertise to demonstrate how our Databricks Data Intelligence Platform can help customers solve their complex data challenges. You'll work with a collaborative, customer-focused team that values innovation and creativity, using your skills to create customized solutions to help our customers achieve their goals and guide their businesses forward. Join us in our quest to change how people work with data and make a
   better world!

   You will be reporting to the Manager, Field Engineering.

   The impact you will have:
     * Form successful relationships with clients throughout your assigned territory to provide technical and business value in collaboration with an Account Executive and a Senior Solutions Architect.
     * Gain excitement from clients about Databricks through hands-on evaluation and Spark programming, integrating with the wider cloud ecosystem and 3rd party applications.
     * Contribute to building the Databricks technical through engagement at workshops, seminars, and meet-ups.
     * Become a Big Data Analytics advisor on aspects of architecture and design.
     * Support your customers by authoring reference architectures, how-tos, and demo applications.
     * Develop both technically and in the pre-sales aspect with the goal of becoming an independently operating Solutions Architect.
job_details.full_text:
Sr. Solutions Engineer

At Databricks, our core values are at the heart of everything we do; creating a culture of proactiveness and a customer-centric mindset guides us to create a unified platform that makes data science and analytics accessible to everyone. We aim to inspire our customers to make informed decisions that push their business forward. We provide a user-friendly and intuitive platform that makes it easy to turn insights into action and fosters a culture of creativity, experimentation, and continuous improvement. You will be an essential part of this mission, using your technical expertise to demonstrate how our Databricks Data Intelligence Platform can help customers solve their complex data challenges. You'll work with a collaborative, customer-focused team that values innovation and creativity, using your skills to create customized solutions to help our customers achieve their goals and guide their businesses forward. Join us in our quest to change how people work with data and make a
   better world!

   You will be reporting to the Manager, Field Engineering.

   The impact you will have:
     * Form successful relationships with clients throughout your assigned territory to provide technical and business value in collaboration with an Account Executive and a Senior Solutions Architect.
     * Gain excitement from clients about Databricks through hands-on evaluation and Spark programming, integrating with the wider cloud ecosystem and 3rd party applications.
     * Contribute to building the Databricks technical through engagement at workshops, seminars, and meet-ups.
     * Become a Big Data Analytics advisor on aspects of architecture and design.
     * Support your customers by authoring reference architectures, how-tos, and demo applications.
     * Develop both technically and in the pre-sales aspect with the goal of becoming an independently operating Solutions Architect.

job_profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on client relationships, pre-sales technical consultation, and advising on data architecture rather than core AI/ML development or engineering. While it mentions 'data science' and 'Spark programming', it lacks specific details about building, training, or deploying AI models, which are central to ML Engineer and GenAI Engineer roles.

phrases.phrase: provide technical and business value
phrases.justification: This phrase directly indicates the need to understand and translate technical capabilities into business benefits for clients.

phrases.phrase: make informed decisions that push their business forward
phrases.justification: This highlights the role's objective of helping clients leverage data for strategic business outcomes.

phrases.phrase: help customers solve their complex data challenges
phrases.justification: This emphasizes understanding client business problems and providing technical solutions.

phrases.phrase: help customers achieve their goals and guide their businesses forward
phrases.justification: This points to aligning technical solutions with client business objectives and strategic direction.

phrases.phrase: Spark programming
phrases.justification: While Spark is a data processing tool, its mention in the context of 'hands-on evaluation' and integration suggests development or scripting activities.

phrases.phrase: integrating with the wider cloud ecosystem and 3rd party applications
phrases.justification: This implies software integration tasks, connecting the platform with other systems.

phrases.phrase: authoring reference architectures, how-tos, and demo applications
phrases.justification: Creating demo applications involves software development to showcase platform capabilities.

phrases.phrase: data science
phrases.justification: This is a broad term that can encompass modeling, but without further specifics, it's a weak indicator.

phrases.phrase: Databricks Data Intelligence Platform
phrases.justification: Databricks is a platform for data engineering, data science, and machine learning, implying involvement with data infrastructure and pipelines.

phrases.phrase: Big Data Analytics advisor on aspects of architecture and design
phrases.justification: Advising on architecture and design in Big Data implies understanding and potentially influencing data pipelines and infrastructure.

phrases.phrase: Form successful relationships with clients
phrases.justification: Directly relates to interpersonal skills and building rapport.

phrases.phrase: in collaboration with an Account Executive and a Senior Solutions Architect
phrases.justification: Highlights teamwork and working with other roles.

phrases.phrase: customer-focused team
phrases.justification: Indicates a strong emphasis on client interaction and service.

phrases.phrase: help customers solve their complex data challenges
phrases.justification: Focuses on identifying and resolving client issues.

phrases.phrase: create customized solutions
phrases.justification: Implies adapting approaches to specific client needs and problems.

phrases.phrase: culture of proactiveness
phrases.justification: Suggests taking initiative and being forward-thinking.

phrases.phrase: innovation and creativity
phrases.justification: Directly mentions valuing new ideas and approaches.

phrases.phrase: Become a Big Data Analytics advisor
phrases.justification: Implies taking a leading, expert role in advising clients.

phrases.phrase: goal of becoming an independently operating Solutions Architect
phrases.justification: Indicates a drive for autonomy and taking ownership of responsibilities.

phrases.phrase: Develop both technically and in the pre-sales aspect
phrases.justification: Suggests a need for continuous learning and skill development in multiple areas.
